```sh
$ ./add_floats 
abc (f32)
  0.1 + 0.2: 3e99999a
        0.3: 3e99999a

xyz (f64)
  0.1 + 0.2: 3fd3333333333334
        0.3: 3fd3333333333333

$ rustc add_floats.rs 
$ ./add_floats 
abc (f32)
  0.1 + 0.2: 111110100110011001100110011010
        0.3: 111110100110011001100110011010

xyz (f64)
  0.1 + 0.2: 11111111010011001100110011001100110011001100110011001100110100
        0.3: 11111111010011001100110011001100110011001100110011001100110011

```
